title: AR User Interface for robot teleoperation
description: Enhancing AR-based robot teleoperation by introducing collision-aware features using depth mesh reconstruction from RGB-D images.

title: Tomato Harvesting Robot
description: Using a AI model and integrates RGB-D images to calculate their positions for precise robotic manipulation and picking.

title: Self-driving car with Reinforcement Learning
description: Developed a self-driving car simulation environment and trained an autonomous agent using the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm from Stable-Baselines3.
